Package org.sibermatica.util

Class ThreadUtils

java.lang.Object
org.sibermatica.util.ThreadUtils
public class ThreadUtils extends Object

ThreadUtils

ThreadUtils it used to control the execution of a thread or many threads at once and easily manages multiple threads.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Ciro Alejo Diaz
